amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection Of Persons And Property
amendatorysection.para: (UTC 101) Sections 30-3801 to 30-38,110 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Uniform Trust Code.

annotation.para: The Nebraska Uniform Trust Code statutes are derived from the Restatement (Third) of Trusts. In re William R. Zutavern Revocable Trust, 309 Neb. 542, 961 N.W.2d 807 (2021).
